name: Papercraft Plunders
description:
Controls

WASD - move

Scroll wheel or 1-3 digits - select combat card

Left click - use combat card

Mouse - aims combat card

E - open treasure chest

Escape - pause

Left shift - zoom out

Backspace - skip dialogue

Description

Two elementary school brothers Wally and Stan have been grounded. Trying to figure out what to do with their time, they come to make a game together. Wally makes enemies that Stan has to fight! Join Stan in his adventure to defeat all his brother's enemies, and let's hope that Mom doesn't find out about this game!

Gameplay takes place on sheets of paper. Move around on grid tiles and select combat cards to use on the enemies. Be careful to avoid enemy attacks and try and make your way to the boss!

Credits
